original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentā antaraghare nisīdanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentāḥ antara ghare nisīdanti pe
okkhitta cakkhu antaraghare nisīdissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
okkhitta cakkhunā antara ghare nisīditabbam yuga mattam pekkhantena

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokento antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentaḥ antaraghare nisīdati āpatti dukkaṭassa
